com.ftdi.j2xx

Class D2xxManager.DriverParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ftdi.j2xx.D2xxManager.DriverParameters
  • Enclosing class:
    D2xxManager

    public static class D2xxManager.DriverParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for read() parameters. Use set/get function to adjust the memory & timeout parameters for opened device.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      D2xxManager.DriverParameters()
      DriverParameters constructor Buffer Size : 16k Max Transfer Size : 16k Number Buffer : 16 Read Timeout : 5000 ms

    • Method Detail

      • setMaxBufferSize

        public boolean setMaxBufferSize(int size)
        This method will set the Max Buffer size to process Rx data in the user space application. The default is 16k , Max is 256K , Min is 64.
        Parameters:
        size - Specifies the value to MaxBufferSize
        Returns:
        If success , return true.

      • getMaxBufferSize

        public int getMaxBufferSize()
        This method will return Rx buffer size of user space application.
        Returns:
        The current size of Rx buffer.

      • setMaxTransferSize

        public boolean setMaxTransferSize(int size)
        This method will set the Max Transfer size to process Rx data in the user space application. The default is 16K , Max is 256K , Min is 64.
        Parameters:
        size - Specifies the value of Rx Max Transfer Size
        Returns:
        If success , return true.

      • getMaxTransferSize

        public int getMaxTransferSize()
        This method will return Max Transfer size for Rx in the user space application.
        Returns:
        The current size of Rx Max Transfer.

      • setBufferNumber

        public boolean setBufferNumber(int number)
        This method will set the Buffer number for Rx in the user space application. The default is 16 , Max is 16 , Min 2.
        Parameters:
        number - Specifies the value to Buffer Number
        Returns:
        If success , return true.

      • getBufferNumber

        public int getBufferNumber()
        This method will return Buffer number for Rx in user space application.
        Returns:
        The current number of Rx buffer.

      • setReadTimeout

        public boolean setReadTimeout(int timeout)
        This method specifies the timeout values to be used for read operations. Default timeout values are 0 which is interpreted as infinite; in this case read calls will block until all of the requested data has been transferred.
        Parameters:
        readTimeout - The value in ms to apply to read operations. Default is 5000 mS
        Returns:
        If success , return true.

      • getReadTimeout

        public int getReadTimeout()
        This method will return timeout values to be used for read operations.
        Returns:
        The current value (ms) of read timeout.
